TestingÂ¶

To run the test code, create a virtual environment in the spaced directory:

python -m venv venv
. ./venv/bin/activate

Then install the package within this same directory as an editable package:

pip install --editable .

This will add an entry_point command line tool which is based upon the Click python library. You can use this command from your terminal while in the spaced directory.

To test the package, type:

space test  # wrapper for pytest

A lot of the testing involves looking at graphs and videos to see if the package is behaving as expected, you can find these graphs as pdf files in the results directory. Likewise, the test videos have an mp4 extension and can be found in the same results directory.
